main.name: Elrond Olympian Gods
main.intro_description: Ten of the most representative greek gods from Olympus Mountain arised to conquer NFT Elrond marketplace.
main.quote: THE DICE OF ZEUS ALWAYS FALL LUCKILY.

about.title: About project
about.project_desc: Our collection includes 10 of the most famous gods from greek mithology. Their army is compound from 10.000 NFTs and they become our allies on the Elrond network. With a strong roadmap and one well defined purpose, our NFTs will rule the NFT marketplace. The NFTs will be listed for mint in different phases on TrustMarket.

card1.title: Gaming
card1.desc: The main purpose is to help you enter in gamming world with our NFTs.

card2.title: Charity
card2.desc: Using our NFTs to help children without any financial support by providing them the necessary devices in order to have acces to a better school education.

card3.title: Partnerships
card3.desc: We will collaborate with other NFT projects to grow our collection`s value.

card4.title: Future projects
card4.desc: This part will be decided based on our members involvement and demand. We will create a Venture Capital Community to get allocation in future crypto projects.

artist.title: Our artist
artist.artist_desc: Passionate about art (painting, graphic design, digital painting), NFTs, reading and video games. For the Horde!

question1.title: What is the collection's supply?
question1.content: The collection will contain 10.000 unique NFTs.

question2.title: On which blockchain the collection will be developed?
question2.content: The collection will be implemented on Elrond Blockchain.

question3.title: Where can I buy ElrondOLympianGods NFTs?
question3.content: You can mint our NFTs on TrustMarket using the links from our site.

question4.title: What is the mint price?
question4.content: First minting price will be 0.3 EGLD.

question6.title: Do you have Giveaways?
question6.content: Yes, we prepared a lot of giveaways for you and a lot of surprises. Follow us on our social media channels and accounts.
